abstract: Pres Roch Marc Christian Kabore of Burkina Faso is sworn in as country’s first new leader in nearly 30 years.
lead_paragraph: The inauguration of Roch Marc Christian Kaboré drew officials from eight other West African countries and thousands of supporters.

headline.main: Burkina Faso: First New Leader in Decades Is Sworn In
headline.print_headline: Africa; Burkina Faso: First New Leader in Decades Is Sworn In

snippet: The inauguration of Roch Marc Christian Kaboré drew officials from eight other West African countries and thousands of supporters.
